text: Very cool. I took me a minute to grok that the landing page was the fully functioning app. I think there's a bug where if you hold space while trying to drag (or shift possibly) it got caught in some kind of infinite feedback loop where the zoom/pan dialog was flashing in and out. I'm on a MacBook Air m2. I really like the design by the way!
